In all seriousness it would be easier to name characters in Hellsing that are not Fucking Awesome in some way, that is a series that absolutely lives on being as fucking awesome as possible regardless of sanity.

This is why I ship every single heroic character with Bayonetta, because she similarly is far too busy being fucking awesome to care about making goddamn sense of being sane and logical.

topics.body:
Today has been the best day of my life that I can remember

I went to my friend's house this evening with a bunch other friends

Playing SSB4 Wii U definitely lived up to the hype; 8-player smash was amazing, and I won the first game, as well as unlocked Falco and Wario for him :P

And I saw the beginning of OR/AS and good god is it pure nostalgia fuel but I don't mind because that's exactly what I hoped for
